questions.quote: I'm sorry. I'm sitting here, the whole meeting, holding my tongue. I've known you a long time, Morty, but I cannot hold it in any longer.
First of all, I don't think you can make a rooster take a dive.
Jerry, this is Joanne, and this is Stan. They're in my short story class with Roxanne and me.
Uh, let me ask you a question. How come you asked Mr. and Mrs. Seinfeld to go to the museum with you?
Hey, did you know that the Yankees don't wear cotton jerseys?
No, no, no, no, no, no, no! What were you thinking when you shot this?
Yeah, the neck hole thing, and I would appreciate it if you would say you're sorry.
Listen, do you think I take everything everybody offers me? You offered me sponge cake yesterday. Did I take it?
Jerry, this is Del Boca Vista's new physical fitness room. They got medicine balls, you can bike ride, anything you want.
Good. Because if I don't get a Black and White cookie I'm not going to be very pleasant to be around.
